channel.title: CVE Feed for Plv8 -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Plv8 -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-1713|2024-03-14T20:14:28.611Z -- plv8 -- plv8
item.description: A user who can create objects in a database with plv8 3.2.1 installed is able to cause deferred triggers to execute as the Superuser during autovacuum.
